languages.text: "Мое "пожелание", Мастер вокса — чтобы блюстители разобрались в ситуации прежде чем пускать экипаж в расход. Расследовать слухи и найти настоящих виновных — и никаких расправ!"
"My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"
languages.original_text: "Мое "пожелание", Мастер вокса — чтобы блюстители разобрались в ситуации прежде чем пускать экипаж в расход. Расследовать слухи и найти настоящих виновных — и никаких расправ!"

traits.locale_text: "My 'wishes', Master of the Vox, is for the guards to sort out the situation before letting the crew go to waste. Investigate the rumors and find the real culprits — and no violence!"
"My 'wishes', Master of the Vox, is for the guards to sort out the situation before letting the crew go to waste. Investigate the rumors and find the real culprits — and no violence!"
"My wishes, Vox Master, are for the guards to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"
"My wishes, Vox Master, are for the guards to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"
"My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"

languages.text: “音阵大师，我希望执法者在把所有人消灭之前先弄清楚怎么回事。调查谣言是怎么来的，找到真正的罪魁祸首，而且绝对不准使用暴力！”
languages.original_text: "My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"

traits.locale_text: “音阵大师，我希望镇压者在把所有人消灭之前先弄清楚怎么回事。调查谣言是怎么来的，找到真正的罪魁祸首，而且绝对不准使用暴力！”

languages.text: «Maestra de vocos, eso es lo que quiero: que el personal de seguridad resuelva la situación antes de que perdamos a toda la tripulación. Que investiguen los rumores y encuentren a los verdaderos culpables. ¡Y sin violencia!».
languages.original_text: "My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"

traits.locale_text: «Maestra de vocos, eso es lo que quiero: que el personal de seguridad resuelva la situación antes de que perdamos a toda la tripulación. Que investiguen los rumores y encuentren a los verdaderos culpables. ¡Y sin violencia!».

languages.text: "Ich wünsche, Voxmeisterin, dass die Enforcer die Situation klären, bevor wir die gesamte Besatzung verlieren. Untersucht die Gerüchte und findet die wahren Schuldigen … ohne Gewalt!"
languages.original_text: "My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"

traits.locale_text: "My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"

languages.text: « Je souhaite, maîtresse-vox, que les prévôts règlent le problème avant que nous devions nous débarrasser de tout l'équipage. Enquêtez sur les rumeurs et démasquez les coupables véritables... mais sans violence ! »
languages.original_text: "My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"

traits.locale_text: « Je souhaite, maîtresse-vox, que les prévôts règlent le problème avant que nous devions nous débarrasser de tout l'équipage. Enquêtez sur les rumeurs et démasquez les coupables véritables... mais sans violence ! »

languages.text: 「ヴォクス・マスター、{mf|俺|私}の願いはエンフォーサーがこの状況を解決して、クルーを全員解雇せずに済むことだ。噂を調査して真犯人を見つけてくれ…暴力は禁止だ！」
languages.original_text: "My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"

traits.locale_text: 「ヴォクス・マスター、{mf|俺|私}の願いはエンフォーサーがこの状況を解決して、クルーを全員解雇せずに済むことだ。噂を調査して真犯人を見つけてくれ…暴力は禁止だ！」

languages.text: "İstediğim şey, tüm mürettebatı kaybetmemize sebep olmadan infazcıların durumu kontrol altına almalarıdır Voks Üstadı. Söylentileri araştırın ve gerçek suçluları bulun. Şiddete de başvurmayın!"
languages.original_text: "My wishes, Vox Master, are for the enforcers to sort out the situation before we forfeit the crew wholesale. Investigate the rumours and find the real culprits — and no violence!"
